https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/zMkHRVUDLuQTwjbAsCj9o8hSns6.jpg Wayne Lo is intellectually gifted, did well at school and plays the violin superbly. At Simon's Rock College in Massachusetts he shot dead two men unprovoked, injured many others and is now serving a life sentence. Troller draws a bold portrait that centres around one question: why? Amok!
